name: SSF15
title: Site-Specific Factor 15
subtitle: Clinical Staging Procedures Performed
notes:
**Note 1:**  Investigators are interested in determining the  clinical staging procedures used to assign tumors to the T1c category.  Procedures used in clinical staging include
* Digital rectal examination (DRE) 
* Imaging techniques of the prostate T
 * Transrectal ultrasound (TRUS) E
 * Endorectal coil magnetic resonance imaging (erMRI)

**Note 2:** Record the procedure(s) used in clinical staging for all T categories regardless of positive or negative findings.  
* Record TRUS-guided biopsy as imaging

**Note 3:**  Clinical procedures performed after needle core biopsy or any surgical procedure of the prostate are not included in this field.
rows: No DRE and no imaging performed
DRE only performed, imaging not performed or unknown if performed
Imaging only performed, DRE not performed or unknown if performed
Not applicable: Information not collected for this case

Unknown or no information
Not documented in patient record
